programme.title: Revolution
programme.desc: A Scottish immigrant is forced to choose sides during the American Revolution when his son is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Stealing Home
programme.desc: A former professional baseball player must confront his life choices when he returns home.

programme.title: Suburban Commando
programme.desc: An intergalactic mercenary comes to Earth to spend a peaceful vacation away from home.

programme.title: The Mummy Lives
programme.desc: An ancient mummy returns from the dead and becomes obsessed with a woman he believes is his dead lover.

programme.title: Jackie Chan's First Strike
programme.desc: A police officer is contracted by the CIA and Russian intelligence to retrieve a stolen nuclear warhead.

programme.title: Presumed Innocent
programme.desc: A prosecutor is accused of killing his co-worker and former lover.

programme.title: Midnight Cabaret
programme.desc: An actress's ideal role turns into a nightmare after she becomes the prime suspect in a series of murders.

programme.title: Alien Autopsy
programme.desc: Two friends make a fake film that they claim is real footage of an autopsy conducted on an extraterrestrial.

programme.title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
programme.desc: The battle between the good and the bad is bound to get ugly.

programme.title: Sesame Street Presents: Follow That Bird
programme.desc: Big Bird runs away and all his old buddies join in the search to find him. Will Big Bird return home?

programme.title: Harlem Globetrotters: The Team That Changed the World
programme.desc: This entertaining sports documentary explores the Harlem Globetrotters' social and cultural impact.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Academy Award-winners Warren Beatty and Annette Bening star in a romantic tale of lovers torn apart by fate.

programme.title: Mr. Nice Guy
programme.desc: A television chef is pursued by rival gangs who think he has an incriminating videotape.

programme.title: My Giant
programme.desc: A second-rate talent agent and a giant Romanian travel the road in pursuit of their dreams.
